ThirdPartyReference.description: Third party reference received from source.

BankAccountCodeCRUK.description: CRUK bank account code. There is a list of values to use to map the correct value with the expected one in PersonHub.

ReceivedDate.description: Date when the donation was received from source. Accepted format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

DonationType.description: Type of donation. There is a list of values to use to map the correct value with the expected one in PersonHub.

EventCode.description:
This field is only available for sport events.
Event code related to the event linked to the donation.

ExcludeFromFinanceFeed.description: Flag to indicate if this payment needs to be excluded from Agresso. E.g  Donations which are sent to Agresso separately.

FinancialPaymentReference.description:
Unique identifier of the payment. To be checked with the finance team what is the expected value.

Mapping requirements: ensure field value matches Donation.PaymentProviderTransactionId.

RestrictionCode.description: Restriction code related to the event linked to the donation. Leave it NULL if not required

DonationPaymentType.description: Type of payment done. There is a list of values to use to map the correct value with the expected one in PersonHub.

PaymentStatus.description: Will be used for Salesforce Gift Refund entity for integration after go-live date. If DonationType = 'Refund' or DonationType = 'Reversal' then PaymentStatus, ELSE "RMPaymentStatus". Status of the payment. There is a list of values to use to map the correct value with the expected one in PersonHub.

IsGiftAided.description: Flag that indicates if the supporter wants the donation to be gift aid

IsPersonalPayment.description: Flag that indicates if the supporter donation is a personal payment or not

ReasonNotGA.description: Reason why the donation was not successfully GA

ProductCode.description: Product code related to the event linked to the donation.

FundraisingPageId.description:
Unique identifier of the page linked to the donation. Used to link the donation with the fundraising page. Leave it NULL if no fundraising page is linked to the donation.

Mapping requirements: ensure field value matches Donation.FundraisingActivityId.

DonationId.description: Unique identifier of the donation. It must be unique, otherwise it will be overriden in source. If a refund or reversal is done for an initial donation, this identifier must be different if the requirement is to not override the initial donation.

PaymentAccount.description: Source system account where the payment was done

PaymentCardProcessingFee.description: Fee for processing a card payment

PaymentCommission.description: Commission that the source system gets for the payment

PaymentGross.description: Gross amount of the payment. If multiple donations are grouped under a unique payment, this field indicates the total gross amount of all the donations, paid to CRUK in a unique payment. Otherwise, this is the gross amount of each individual donation

PaymentNet.description: Net amount of the payment. If multiple donations are grouped under a unique payment, this field indicates the total net amount of all the donations, paid to CRUK in a unique payment. Otherwise, this is the net amount of each individual donation

LetterCode.description: Code representing the appropriate Thanking letter to be sent for this donation. Value to be defined with the stakeholders and CRM developers

PaymentVAT.description: VAT amount of the payment. If multiple donations are grouped under a unique payment, this field indicates the total VAT amount of all the donations, paid to CRUK in a unique payment. Otherwise, this is the VAT amount of each individual donation

DonationSource.description: Source of the donation provided by the source (event, fundraising activity etc). Leave it NULL if unknown

DirectDebitPaymentFrequency.description: If the donation is a direct debit, this field indicates the frequency of it (monthly, weekly, annual). If it is not a direct donation then default it to 'Single'

DirectDebitStartDate.description: Date when the direct debit starts. Leave it NULL if the donation is not a direct debit. Accepted format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

DonorMessage.description: Message placed by the donor in the donation message box

PaymentDate.description: Date when the money has been transferred to CRUK bank account. If multiple donations are grouped under a unique payment, this field indicates the date the global payment has been done. Otherwise, this is the date of each individual donation. Accepted format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

TransitionalReliefAmount.description: Transitional relief amount of the source system

TotalAmountIncludingGiftAidAndTransition.description: Total amount paid to CRUK, including the Gift Aid and the transitional relief amount

AppealName.description: Name of campaign or appeal linked to the fundraising page. Leave it NULL if unknown

DonationPrivacyNoticeVersion.description: Version of the donation privacy notice provided to the donor

DonationConsentStatement.description: Consent statement of the donation provided to the donor

ReferenceCharityArea.description: Name of the charity area which the fundraising page was created for

ReferenceIncomeType.description:
Type of donation. If the donation is linked to a fundraising page then use "Online fundraising".
If it is a direct donation, one time then "One time Direct Donation". If it is a recurring direct donation then "Recurring Direct Donation"

PaymentProcessingFeeRate.description: Fee rate of the payment processing

PaymentProcessingFeeAmount.description: Fee amount of the payment processing

TotalSourceCharges.description: Total amount of charges applied by the source system

NetDonationMinusVAT.description: Net amount of the donation minus the VAT.

GiftAidAmount.description: Total amount of the gift aid value

ParentPayment.description: Unique identifier of the initial donation. Used for refunds and reversals to link the donation to its initial one.

ReasonForRefund.description: Reason for refunding the donation.  There is a list of values to use to map the correct value with the expected one in PersonHub.
enum: Did Not Take Part in Event

FinancialBatchNumber.description: Used by the Oxford team to group a number of individual transactions into a batch for accounting purposes. This is done in the Financial Batch screen - the batch numbers are auto-generated in Siebel and shown against the individual donations for reference.

ThankingLetterStatus.description: Status of the thanking letter process

GADLetterCode.description: Code indicating the GAD letter to be sent. Value to be defined with the stakeholders and CRM developers

GADMethod.description: Method used for the GiftAid declaration

InMemoryName.description: Donation done in the memory of a person

CelebrantDataSource.description: Name of the celebrant company sharing the donation data

CelebrantExternalReference.description: External reference of the celebrant company sharing the donation data

GADType.description: Gift Aid Type, coming directly from report file (pre populated), no logic from DI process

MobileOperator.description: Mobile Operator through which the donation was done. Vodafone will be handling donation data differently to all other networks therefore it is important that supporters who have donated via Vodafone can be identified. This is to allow the claims team to include/exclude certain mobile operators

Keyword.description: Keyword used to identify some donation campaigns, like the SMS ones

ShortCode.description: Short code of the bank account from which the donation was done

SMSToCompleteDate.description: When a donation is done through an SMS, this field contains the date the donation is done. Accepted format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

ReceivedDateTime.description: Date and Time of the reception of the donation. Accepted format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss

UniqueId.description: Unique identifier of a donation from source

RegistrationId.description: Unique identifier of the donation registration.

OrderReference.description:
Reference of the order, used to link donations to the source recurring payment order.

This is mapped into the listOfDonations.donations.orderReference field in the Siebel xml. and the 'SRM Order Reference' field in the Siebel UI.

SourceReference.description: Reference of the source of the donation.

PaymentProviderTransactionId.description:
"A unique identifier assigned to a donation transaction by the source or a payment processor (such as Briantree, Paypal or anothe third party payment provider). Finance Team uses this Id for tracking, reconciliation, reporting and trouble shooting purposes. For Paypal, it is the Capture ID (completed payment).

Mapping requirements: ensure field value matches Donation.FinancialPaymentReference."

FundraisingActivityId.description: Unique identifier of the fundraising page assigned in the source system. It must be unique and cannot be NULL, so a unique value must be assigned if not provided at source when sharing the fundraising page details.

RMCampaignCode.description: This is the unique identifier used for a specific Marketing Campaign, added for the Salesforce Integration.

RMDataSource.description: This refers to the system that sent the data, added for the Salesforce Integration.

RMEventCode.description: This is the unique identifier for a specific event or activity that supporters can participate in for fundraising. Added for the Salesforce Integration.

RMFinancialAccountType.description: A categorisation of the source of a transaction into generic types (E.g. Income, expenditure, assets and liabilities to which the transactions are posted) which map to account code in CRUK Finance System. They should be applicable across business units and organisations. Added for the Salesforce Integration.

RMFinancialAccountSubType.description: A further breakdown of the Financial Account Type. The purpose is to provide more detailed information on how income/expenditure is generated/spent (e.g. entry fee or donations). This maps to activity code in CRUK Finance System. Added for the Salesforce Integration.

RMInMemoriam.description: Indicates that a donation has been made in memory of a person. Added for the Salesforce Integration.

RMProductCode.description: The unique identifier for a specific CRUK financial product. Added for the Salesforce Integration.

RMCollectionType.description: The "Method of Fundraising" field categorises the various ways in which donations and support are generated for CRUK. This field helps in understanding and tracking the source and type of fundraising that has led to a donation. Added for the Salesforce Integration.

RMMerchandiseType.description: Merchandise reference information for retail purchases, added for the Salesforce Integration.

RMDonationAmount.description: The total amount of a financial transaction received and included tax, added for the Salesforce Integration.

OwnerType.description: This field is to indicate if the source sends Organisations or Individual supporters data. If the source clearly identifies the type then they will send 'Organisation' for organisations supporters, 'Supporter' for individual supporters. If the source cannot identify the type then they will send NULL.

RMAnonymousDonor.description: Indicates whether the Donor is Anonymous, set to true if AnonymousAtSource and GuestIndicator are both TRUE

RMFinancialGrouping.description: Financial grouping based on payment method. Value should match provided options in LOV.

RMPaymentStatus.description: Will be used for Salesorce Gift Transaction entity only. Details the Status of a payment, value should match provided options in LOV.

RMThankingStatus.description: Status of Thanking Letter for Salesforce. Value should match provided options in LOV, or provide null if not applicable / not known.
